Additional Scope Comments: All Email will be handled under items 010 and 011.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email at the end of the Calendar Year.
Transfer Instructions: For Classified emails accounts, transfer 25 years after cutoff.  For Unclassified email accounts, transfer 15 years after cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: NGA has legacy email for the top 6 agency officials dating back to 2010.  NGA has the legacy email for all other Capstone Officials who held or currently serve in Capstone positions from June 2016 forward.  The majority of all Capstone Official email is August 2016 forward.  NGA also has legacy email for a limited number of Non-Capstone user accounts going back to 2010.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: Agency Org Charts unavailable on NGA public site.  Hardcopy agency org charts provided with Capstone Approach package submission and not available for public viewing (U/FOUO).
